handlebit.handlebitInit: Handlebit板初始化，请在开机时执行
handlebit.handle_setPixelRGBArgs: 设置彩灯颜色，输入索引，范围1到9
handlebit.clearLight: 清除彩灯颜色，关闭彩灯
handlebit.handle_checkCurrentColor: 获取颜色传感器检测到的颜色值
handlebit.onHandleButtonPressed: 侦测按键手柄按下状态
handlebit.handle_shake: 开启或者关闭手柄震动
handlebit.handlebit_ultrasonic: 返回超声波传感器检测值
